alert.note: Alert for Bighorn Mountains Southeast; Bighorn Mountains West; Owl Creek and Bridger Mountains (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 26 at 5:41AM MDT until March 27 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Periods of snow. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches in the eastern slopes of the Big Horn Range, 1 to 4 inches elsewhere. * WHERE...Owl Creek and Bridger Mountains, Bighorn Mountains West and Bighorn Mountains Southeast. * WHEN...Until 6 AM MDT Monday. The most widespread snow will occur this afternoon and evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Due to the showery and banded nature of the snow, amounts may vary over short distances.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Bighorn Mountains Southeast; Bighorn Mountains West; Owl Creek and Bridger Mountains
